name: Toy Flight Simulator Online
description:
Fly online with up to 15 players in this free casual RC flight sim for mobile. Choose between an onscreen joystick or tilt controls to fly and explore new worlds filled with stars & friends to crash into. Touch either side of the screen to control yaw. Realistic flight sim combined with fun, casual online play. All 100% free!

Unlimited free online RC flight simulation with no in app purchases. Take to the skies across three exciting levels and five toy aircraft each with their own personality and realistic flight models on an adorable, cartoon scale.

To change your pilot's name, click on the name title in the bottom left corner of the menu screen. Servers located in United States, Europe, East Europe, Japan, & China. Providing you with the best possible connection anywhere in the world. Powered by Photon Realtime by Exit Games. Music by Matthew Pablo http://www.matthewpablo.com/

Features:

Free online RC flight simulator, no in app purchases to distract you from having fun.

Up to 15 players per room with automatic matchmaking.

Casual RC flight simulator with realistic flight models created by pilots.

Three unique worlds to explore: The Caves, Rocky Valley, and Apocalypse.

Cross platform multiplayer, play with friends on any device or the web!

International servers for mobile pilots across the world.
